parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:**1** to **50**. Default value: **50**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the resource.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource ID. You can specify up to 20 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

*   **VPC**
*   **VSWITCH**
*   **ROUTETABLE**
*   **EIP**
*   **VpnGateway**
*   **NATGATEWAY**
*   **COMMONBANDWIDTHPACKAGE**: EIP bandwidth plan

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tag value. You can specify up to 20 tag values. It can be an empty string.

The value can be up to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The value must start with a letter but cannot start with `aliyun` or `acs:`. The value cannot contain `http://` or `https://`.

>  You must specify at least one of **ResourceId.N** and **Tag.N** (**Tag.N.Key** and **Tag.N.Value**).
